item.description:
This big band is great -- serious horns, great vocals, they really SWING!

I don't know the venue but it sounds pretty nice. We can meet near the right side of the stage. I am happy to host!

* * * * * *

Special Uptown Swing Tropical Dance Party

Hawaiian shirts and festive attire encouraged!
Fun extras planned!

Beantown Swing Orchestra Big Band Swing
http://www.beantownswing.com/

Information:

Have Fun!
Get Exercise
Learn to Dance
Meet New People
Beginner Friendly
No Partner Needed

Great Live Music
Fabulous Wood Dance Floor
Air Conditioned
Swing Dance Lesson Included
Singles & Couples Welcome
Friendly, Casual Atmosphere
Town Lots & Street Parking (meters free after 8:00pm)
Near T & Bus stops


8:15pm–Midnight
Lesson 8:15–9:00pm
(Beginner lesson followed by something new each month.)


Admission
$15 ($10 with Student ID)
item.name: Uptown Swing Dance
